ComicInfo.Series: Anno Dracula: 1895: Seven Days in Mayhem
ComicInfo.Summary:
When the inaugural meeting of the Council of Seven Days is raided by Dracula's feared secret police, Kate Reed is rescued by Fah Lo Suee, daughter of the mysterious crime lord known only by some as the Lord of Strange Deaths. Meanwhile Penelope Churchward visits the Tower of London to meet the infamous, Graf von Orlock, Dracula's supreme bogey man.
